name: Lockscreen Tasks
description:
See your tasks list on your lock screen.


How to use it?

  • Add tasks to the list
  • Choose priority
  • Click on the device frame
  • Export
  • Set as Lock screen


Video

https://twitter.com/vyshnav_xyz/status/1475784509790601216?s=20
